ANTIAIR_TARGETING.name: Anti-Air Targeting
ANTIAIR_TARGETING.description: This 'Mech has a targeting computer that displays a predictive targeting reticle when targeting aircraft

BARREL_FIST_L.name: Barrel Fist (L)
BARREL_FIST_L.description: This 'Mech can melee unexpectedly capably using its hand-less left arm

BARREL_FIST_R.name: Barrel Fist (R)
BARREL_FIST_R.description: This 'Mech can melee unexpectedly capably using its hand-less right arm

BARREL_FISTS.name: Barrel Fists
BARREL_FISTS.description: This 'Mech can melee unexpectedly capably using its hand-less arms

BATTLECOMP.name: Battle Computer
BATTLECOMP.description: The Tacticon B-2000 Battle Computer extends sensor range

BATTLEFIST_L.name: Battlefist (L)
BATTLEFIST_L.description: The left Hand actuator of a 'Mech with Battlefist has been specially modified for close combat

BATTLEFIST_R.name: Battlefist (R)
BATTLEFIST_R.description: The right Hand actuator of a 'Mech with Battlefist has been specially modified for close combat

BATTLEFISTS.name: Battlefists
BATTLEFISTS.description: The Hand actuators of a 'Mech with Battlefists have been specially modified for close combat

CBTCPU.name: Combat Computer
CBTCPU.description: An advanced Combat Computer can manage heat levels more efficiently than standard computers

CMD_MECH.name: Command 'Mech
CMD_MECH.description: This 'Mech has been designed as a command unit, effectively extending sensor range

COMPACT_MECH.name: Compact 'Mech
COMPACT_MECH.description:
(non-functional flavor text)
This 'Mech is especially small and easy to transport, taking up half the normal space in a transport

COWL.name: Cowl
COWL.description: This 'Mech has a cowl around its cockpit resulting in increased head armor

DISTRACTING.name: Distracting
DISTRACTING.description: This 'Mech has a fearsome reputation and/or appearance that can affect enemy competence

EASYTOMAINTAIN.name: Easy To Maintain
EASYTOMAINTAIN.description: This 'Mech is designed for easy maintenance

EASY_PILOT.name: Easy to Pilot
EASY_PILOT.description: This 'Mech is designed to be used by the Greenest pilots and gets a bonus to Piloting Skill

EXT_TWIST.name: Extended Torso Twist
EXT_TWIST.description: This 'Mech can twist its torso further than typical

FAST_RELOAD_AC.name: Fast Reload AC
FAST_RELOAD_AC.description: Shortened reload time for the weapon group it is applied to

FAST_RELOAD_AC10.name: Fast Reload AC/10
FAST_RELOAD_AC10.description: Shortened reload time for the weapon it is applied to

FAST_RELOAD_LBX10.name: Fast Reload LBX/10
FAST_RELOAD_LBX10.description: Shortened reload time for the weapon it is applied to

FAST_RELOAD_LRM.name: Fast Reload LRM
FAST_RELOAD_LRM.description: Shortened reload time for the weapon group it is applied to

FAST_RELOAD_TORSO.name: Fast Reload (Torso)
FAST_RELOAD_TORSO.description: Shortened reload time for torso-mounted weapons

GOOD_REP.name: Good Reputation
GOOD_REP.description:
(non-functional flavor text)
This 'Mech has earned a good reputation either through proven capabilities or via clever marketing

HYPER_ACTUATOR.name: Hyper-Extending Actuators
HYPER_ACTUATOR.description: This 'Mech can point its arms into the rear arc

HYPER_ACTUATOR_DV.name: Hyper-Extending Actuators
HYPER_ACTUATOR_DV.description: This 'Mech can point its arms into the rear arc

HYPER_ACTUATOR_MAD.name: Hyper-Extending Actuators
HYPER_ACTUATOR_MAD.description: This 'Mech can point its arms into the rear arc

HYPER_ACTUATOR_QKD.name: Hyper-Extending Actuators
HYPER_ACTUATOR_QKD.description: This 'Mech can point its arms into the rear arc

IMPROVED_COMS.name: Improved Communications
IMPROVED_COMS.description: This 'Mech has an exceptionally powerful communications suite and gains a benefit to sensor range

IMP_COOLING.name: Improved Cooling Jackets
IMP_COOLING.description: Improved Cooling Jackets reduce the heat generated by weapons mounted on this 'Mech

IMP_COOLING_AC.name: Improved Cooling AC
IMP_COOLING_AC.description: An Improved Cooling Jacket reduces the heat generated by the weapon group it is applied to

IMP_COOLING_PPC.name: Improved Cooling PPC
IMP_COOLING_PPC.description: An Improved Cooling Jacket reduces the heat generated by the weapon group it is applied to

IMP_LIFE_SUPPORT.name: Improved Life Support
IMP_LIFE_SUPPORT.description: This 'Mech has enhanced defenses for the pilot

IMPROVED_TARGETING.name: Improved Targeting
IMPROVED_TARGETING.description: This 'Mech has a targeting computer that displays a predictive targeting reticle

IMPROVED_TARGETING_LONG.name: Improved Targeting (Long)
IMPROVED_TARGETING_LONG.description: This 'Mech has a targeting computer that improves accuracy of long range weaponry

IMPROVED_TARGETING_MEDIUM.name: Improved Targeting (Medium)
IMPROVED_TARGETING_MEDIUM.description: This 'Mech has a targeting computer that improves accuracy of medium range weaponry

IMPROVED_TARGETING_SHORT.name: Improved Targeting (Short)
IMPROVED_TARGETING_SHORT.description: This 'Mech has a targeting computer that improves accuracy of short range weaponry

LOW_PROFILE.name: Low Profile
LOW_PROFILE.description: The 'Mech is constructed to present a low profile to any incoming fire

MODULAR_WEAPONS.name: Modular Weapons
MODULAR_WEAPONS.description: Weapons can be repaired and replaced in half the normal time, reducing overall maintenance times

MULTITRAC.name: Multi-Trac
MULTITRAC.description: This 'Mech has a targeting computer that displays a predictive targeting reticle and improves lock-on time

NARROW_PROFILE.name: Narrow Profile
NARROW_PROFILE.description: The 'Mech is constructed to present a narrow profile to any incoming fire

NIMBLEJUMPER.name: Nimble Jumper
NIMBLEJUMPER.description: This 'Mech is designed to be more effective with Jump Jets

OVERHEAD_ARMS.name: Overhead Arms
OVERHEAD_ARMS.description: This 'Mech's arms are mounted high and can fire over some obstacles, possessing extra armor to absorb the anticipated return fire

PROTECTED_ACTUATOR.name: Protected Actuators
PROTECTED_ACTUATOR.description: This 'Mech has reinforced ankle actuators making it a tougher target for leg attacks

REINFORCED_LEGS.name: Reinforced Legs
REINFORCED_LEGS.description: This 'Mech is less susceptible to leg damage

RUGGED1.name: Rugged (1)
RUGGED1.description: This 'Mech does not require much attention to keep it active and ready

RUGGED2.name: Rugged (2)
RUGGED2.description: This 'Mech does not require much attention to keep it active and ready

SEARCHLIGHT.name: Searchlight
SEARCHLIGHT.description: This 'Mech has been fitted with a high-powered searchlight

STABLE.name: Stable
STABLE.description: This 'Mech is inherently stable and gets a bonus to mobility

STABILIZED_WEAPON.name: Stabilized Weapon
STABILIZED_WEAPON.description: This 'Mech has been designed to reduce recoil of fired weapons, effectively reducing weapon spread

UBIQUITOUS.name: Ubiquitous
UBIQUITOUS.description: This 'Mech has been in production for centuries or is otherwise so heavily mass-produced that replacement parts are readily available

VARRANGE_TARGETING.name: Variable Range Targeting
VARRANGE_TARGETING.description: This 'Mech has a targeting computer that displays a predictive targeting reticle

BAD_REP.name: Bad Reputation
BAD_REP.description:
(non-functional flavor text)
This 'Mech is perfectly sound and operable, but for some reason has earned a bad reputation

COOLING_FLAWS.name: Cooling System Flaws
COOLING_FLAWS.description: This 'Mech has a design flaw resulting in excess heat buildup

CRAMPED_COCKPIT.name: Cramped Cockpit
CRAMPED_COCKPIT.description: This 'Mech has an uncomfortably small cockpit that makes it unpleasant to pilot

DIFFICULT_EJECT.name: Difficult Ejection
DIFFICULT_EJECT.description: This 'Mech has flaws in its emergency escape system, effectively reducing head structure

DIFFICULTTOMAINTAIN.name: Difficult To Maintain
DIFFICULTTOMAINTAIN.description: This 'Mech is built with little regard to maintenance

EXP_ACTUATOR.name: Exposed Actuators
EXP_ACTUATOR.description: This 'Mech has fragile ankle actuators making it an easier target for leg attacks

EXPOSED_LINKAGE.name: Exposed Weapon Linkage
EXPOSED_LINKAGE.description: This 'Mech has fragile arm actuators making it an easier target for arm attacks

EXPOSED_LINKAGE_RT.name: Exposed Weapon Linkage
EXPOSED_LINKAGE_RT.description: This 'Mech has an exposed weapon linkage to its right torso weaponry

HARD_PILOT.name: Hard to Pilot
HARD_PILOT.description: This 'Mech is designed to be used by expert pilots and gets a penalty to Piloting Skill

MIN_ARMS.name: Minimal Arms
MIN_ARMS.description:
(non-functional flavor text)
This 'Mech cannot perform physical attacks with its arms

NO_EJECT.name: No Ejection System
NO_EJECT.description:
(non-functional flavor text)
This 'Mech lacks an emergency escape system

NO_TWIST.name: Reduced Torso Twist
NO_TWIST.description: This 'Mech has slightly reduced torso twist speed

NON_STANDARD_PARTS.name: Non-Standard Parts
NON_STANDARD_PARTS.description: This 'Mech is constructed with non-standard components such that replacement parts are not readily available

POOR_LIFE_SUPPORT.name: Poor Life Support
POOR_LIFE_SUPPORT.description: This 'Mech has reduced defenses for the pilot

POOR_TARGETING.name: Poor Targeting
POOR_TARGETING.description: This 'Mech has an impaired targeting computer that cannot display a predictive targeting reticle

POOR_TARGETING_SHORT.name: Poor Targeting (Short)
POOR_TARGETING_SHORT.description: This 'Mech has an impaired targeting computer that compromises accuracy of short range weaponry

POOR_TARGETING_PPC.name: Poor Targeting (PPC)
POOR_TARGETING_PPC.description: This 'Mech has an impaired targeting computer that compromises accuracy of the weapon group it is applied to

POOR_WORKMANSHIP.name: Poor Workmanship
POOR_WORKMANSHIP.description: This 'Mech is one quality step lower than normal

PROTOTYPE.name: Prototype
PROTOTYPE.description: This 'Mech's systems are less resilient and lack the redundancy that will be incorporated into the production model

RAMSHACKLE.name: Ramshackle
RAMSHACKLE.description: Hard service and substandard maintenance have led to an unpredictable machine patched together with bailing wire and prayers

UNBALANCED.name: Unbalanced
UNBALANCED.description: This 'Mech is inherently imbalanced and suffers a penalty to mobility

WEAK_HEAD_1.name: Weak Head Armor (1)
WEAK_HEAD_1.description: This 'Mech has less potential and maximum armor protecting its cockpit than typical

WEAK_HEAD_2.name: Weak Head Armor (2)
WEAK_HEAD_2.description: This 'Mech has less potential and maximum armor protecting its cockpit than typical

WEAK_LEGS.name: Weak Legs
WEAK_LEGS.description: This 'Mech has legs that buckle under pressure

WEAPON_JAM_AC.name: Ammo Feed Problem AC
WEAPON_JAM_AC.description: Increased jam chance for the weapon group it is applied to

WEAPON_JAM_AC20.description: Increased jam chance for the weapon it is applied to

WEAPON_JAM_SRM.description: Increased jam chance for the weapon group it is applied to

COOLANT_COUPLER.name: Coolant Coupler

FULL_HEAD_EJECT.name: Full-Head Ejection System
FULL_HEAD_EJECT.description: This 'Mech's entire head launches off in the event of an ejection, effectively boosting head structure

FULL_TWIST.name: Full 360 Torso Twist
FULL_TWIST.description: This 'Mech can freely twist its torso a full 360 degrees

POWER_REVERSE.name: Power Reverse
POWER_REVERSE.description: This 'Mech can go practically as fast backward as it can forward

BSC_SYSTEM.name: BSC System
BSC_SYSTEM.description: The Ballistic Siege Compensator improves performance of ballistic weapons

CQC_SUITE.name: CQC Suite
CQC_SUITE.description: This 'Mech has a range boost to short range weaponry

INTERCEPT_SYSTEM.name: Intercept System
INTERCEPT_SYSTEM.description: This 'Mech has a targeting computer that displays a predictive targeting reticle

MISSILERY_SUITE.name: Missilery Suite

OPTIMISED_CAPACITORS.name: Optimised Capacitors

RANGEFINDER_SUITE.name: Rangefinder Suite

TARGETING_BAFFLES.name: Targeting Baffles
TARGETING_BAFFLES.description: This 'Mech has reinforced side baffles, boosting its durability

VECTORED_THRUST.name: Vectored Thrust Kit
VECTORED_THRUST.description: This 'Mech is designed to thrust fast and hard with Jump Jets

AERODYNAMIC.name: Aerodynamic
AERODYNAMIC.description: This 'Mech has a streamlined shape that enhances speed and acceleration

ASSAULT_SCOUT.name: Ultra-Heavy Scout

HIGH_MAINTENANCE.name: High Maintenance
HIGH_MAINTENANCE.description: This 'Mech requires extra attention to keep it active and ready

HIGH_MANEUVER.name: High Maneuverability
HIGH_MANEUVER.description: This 'Mech has a reduced risk of being outflanked and surrounded

IMPROVED_EJECT.name: Improved Ejection System
IMPROVED_EJECT.description: This 'Mech has an enhanced pilot ejection mechanism, effectively boosting head structure

LOW_MAINTENANCE.description: This 'Mech does not require much attention to keep it active and ready

LOW_MANEUVER.name: Low Maneuverability
LOW_MANEUVER.description: This 'Mech has a heightened risk of being outflanked and surrounded

MACHINE_GUNNER.name: Machine Gunner
